ProjectTitle: Kant’s Cosmological Critique: Rational Cosmology and the Development of the Critical Philosophy
InitialFeedbackHistory: 23/06/2022 4. [REDACTED] and documentation: [REDACTED] you considered using tools that can help with data management? [REDACTED] you haven’t tried out a reference manager like [REDACTED] (www.zotero.org) yet, we heartily recommend those. [REDACTED] easy to use, have a lot of handy document organization features, and can save you time when you start writing to publish. [REDACTED] you work with images, [REDACTED] (https://tropy.org) may be useful, [REDACTED] is free and specifically designed to organize and annotate archival images. [REDACTED] qualitative data analysis of primarily textual information (text mining) NVivo may be handy, for more information: https://admin.kuleuven.be/icts/english/research/software/Nvivo/nvivo. 6, 7.
